description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Radiant, Weapon

Standard

+18 vs AC; 1d10+1 damage plus 7 radiant damage.

At-Will

Standard

Make two eldritch blast attacks against different targets.

Daily âœ¦ Radiant

Standard

Area burst 1 within 10

Sustain Minor

+20 vs Fortitude; 4d6+7 radiant damage, and the target is restrained (save ends). The luminary must make new attack rolls when she sustains the effect.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Radiant

Standard

Close burst 10

Affects two targets in the area; +20 vs Will; 2d6+7 radiant damage, and the target is dazed until the end of the luminary's next turn.

Daily

Free

Trigger: When the luminary makes an attack roll, saving throw, ability check, or skill check

The luminary rerolls and uses the better of the two results.

At-Will

Minor

The luminary chooses the closest enemy within line of sight. That enemy takes an extra 2d6 damage from the luminary's attacks. A luminary can't curse an enemy already under the effect of ironfell curse or another creature's curse.
When an enemy under the effect of ironfell curse is reduced to 0 hit points, the luminary gains a +5 power bonus to a single d20 roll before the end of her next turn.

Encounter

Move

The luminary flies up to 7 squares, landing in an unoccupied space; she becomes insubstantial during this movement. An enemy that makes an opportunity attack against the luminary during this movement takes 10 radiant damage.
